name: Eve (Celeste Chan)
description:
This is Eve, a small project with a simple design of making you smile.
Send this to a friend if they are feeling a little blue.

Featuring:
- Compliments
- Hospitality
- Lame Jokes
- Lame Pick-up Lines
- Plants
- A Venting Station

All things needed in order to de-stress and bring you back into a cheery mood.

Kudos to you if your name is Adam ;)
